verses.verse: Take heed<WG4337> that ye do<WG4160> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> alms<WG1654> before<WG1715> men,<WG444> to be seen<WG2300> of them: <WG846> otherwise<WG1490> ye have<WG2192> no<WG3756> reward<WG3408> of<WG3844> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> heaven. <WG3772>

Therefore <WG3767> when<WG3752> thou doest<WG4160> thine alms,<WG1654> do not<WG3361> sound a trumpet<WG4537> before<WG1715> thee,<WG4675> as<WG5618> the<WG3588> hypocrites<WG5273> do<WG4160> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> synagogues<WG4864> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> streets,<WG4505> that<WG3704> they may have glory<WG1392> of<WG5259> men.<WG444> Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> They have<WG568> their<WG848> reward. <WG3408>
But <WG1161> when thou<WG4675> doest<WG4160> alms,<WG1654> let not<WG3361> thy<WG4675> left hand<WG710> know<WG1097> what<WG5101> thy<WG4675> right hand<WG1188> doeth: <WG4160>

That <WG3704> thine<WG4675> alms<WG1654> may be<WG5600> in<WG1722> secret: <WG2927> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> which seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927> himself<WG848> shall reward<WG591> thee<WG4671> openly. <WG1722> <WG5318>

And <WG2532> when<WG3752> thou prayest,<WG4336> thou shalt not<WG3756> be<WG2071> as<WG5618> the<WG3588> hypocrites<WG5273> are: for<WG3754> they love<WG5368> to pray<WG4336> standing<WG2476> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> synagogues<WG4864> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> corners<WG1137> of the<WG3588> streets,<WG4113> that<WG3704> they may be seen <WG5316> <WG302> of men.<WG444> Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> They have<WG568> their<WG848> reward. <WG3408>

But <WG1161> thou,<WG4771> when<WG3752> thou prayest,<WG4336> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> thy<WG4675> closet,<WG5009> and<WG2532> when thou hast shut<WG2808> thy<WG4675> door,<WG2374> pray<WG4336> to thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> secret;<WG2927> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> which seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927> shall reward<WG591> thee<WG4671> openly. <WG1722> <WG5318>

But <WG1161> when ye pray,<WG4336> use not vain repetitions, <WG945> <WG3361> as <WG5618> the<WG3588> heathen<WG1482> do: for<WG1063> they think<WG1380> that<WG3754> they shall be heard<WG1522> for<WG1722> their<WG848> much speaking. <WG4180>

Be not<WG3361> ye therefore<WG3767> like unto<WG3666> them: <WG846> for<WG1063> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> knoweth<WG1492> what things<WG3739> ye have<WG2192> need<WG5532> of, before<WG4253> ye<WG5209> ask<WG154> him. <WG846>
After this manner<WG3779> therefore<WG3767> pray<WG4336> ye: <WG5210> Our <WG2257> Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> art in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> Hallowed<WG37> be thy<WG4675> name. <WG3686>
Thy <WG4675> kingdom<WG932> come.<WG2064> Thy<WG4675> will<WG2307> be done<WG1096> in<WG1909> earth,<WG1093> as<WG5613> it is in<WG1722> heaven. <WG3772>
Give <WG1325> us<WG2254> this day<WG4594> our<WG2257> daily<WG1967> bread. <WG740>
And <WG2532> forgive<WG863> us<WG2254> our<WG2257> debts,<WG3783> as<WG5613> we<WG2249> forgive<WG863> our<WG2257> debtors. <WG3781>

And <WG2532> lead<WG1533> us<WG2248> not<WG3361> into<WG1519> temptation,<WG3986> but<WG235> deliver<WG4506> us<WG2248> from<WG575> evil: <WG4190> For<WG3754> thine<WG4675> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> kingdom,<WG932> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> glory,<WG1391> forever. <WG1519> <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
For <WG1063> if<WG1437> ye forgive<WG863> men<WG444> their<WG846> trespasses,<WG3900> your<WG5216> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> will also<WG2532> forgive<WG863> you: <WG5213>
But <WG1161> if<WG1437> ye forgive<WG863> not<WG3361> men<WG444> their<WG846> trespasses,<WG3900> neither<WG3761> will your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> forgive<WG863> your<WG5216> trespasses. <WG3900>

Moreover <WG1161> when<WG3752> ye fast,<WG3522> be<WG1096> not,<WG3361> as<WG5618> the<WG3588> hypocrites,<WG5273> of a sad countenance: <WG4659> for<WG1063> they disfigure<WG853> their<WG848> faces,<WG4383> that<WG3704> they may appear<WG5316> unto men<WG444> to fast.<WG3522> Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> They have<WG568> their<WG848> reward. <WG3408>
But <WG1161> thou,<WG4771> when thou fastest,<WG3522> anoint<WG218> thine<WG4675> head,<WG2776> and<WG2532> wash<WG3538> thy<WG4675> face; <WG4383>

That <WG3704> thou appear<WG5316> not<WG3361> unto men<WG444> to fast,<WG3522> but<WG235> unto thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> secret: <WG2927> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father,<WG3962> which seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret,<WG2927> shall reward<WG591> thee<WG4671> openly. <WG1722> <WG5318>

Lay not up <WG2343> <WG3361> for yourselves<WG5213> treasures<WG2344> upon<WG1909> earth,<WG1093> where<WG3699> moth<WG4597> and<WG2532> rust<WG1035> doth corrupt,<WG853> and<WG2532> where<WG3699> thieves<WG2812> break through<WG1358> and<WG2532> steal: <WG2813>

But <WG1161> lay up<WG2343> for yourselves<WG5213> treasures<WG2344> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> where<WG3699> neither<WG3777> moth<WG4597> nor<WG3777> rust<WG1035> doth corrupt,<WG853> and<WG2532> where<WG3699> thieves<WG2812> do not<WG3756> break through<WG1358> nor<WG3761> steal: <WG2813>
For <WG1063> where<WG3699> your<WG5216> treasure<WG2344> is,<WG2076> there<WG1563> will your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> be<WG2071> also. <WG2532>

The <WG3588> light<WG3088> of the<WG3588> body<WG4983> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> eye: <WG3788> if<WG1437> therefore<WG3767> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788> be<WG5600> single,<WG573> thy<WG4675> whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> shall be<WG2071> full of light. <WG5460>

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788> be<WG5600> evil,<WG4190> thy<WG4675> whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> shall be<WG2071> full of darkness.<WG4652> If<WG1487> therefore<WG3767> the<WG3588> light<WG5457> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thee<WG4671> be<WG2076> darkness,<WG4655> how great<WG4214> is that darkness! <WG4655>

No man<WG3762> can<WG1410> serve<WG1398> two<WG1417> masters: <WG2962> for<WG1063> either<WG2228> he will hate<WG3404> the<WG3588> one,<WG1520> and<WG2532> love<WG25> the<WG3588> other;<WG2087> or<WG2228> else he will hold<WG472> to the one,<WG1520> and<WG2532> despise<WG2706> the<WG3588> other.<WG2087> Ye cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> serve <WG1398> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> mammon. <WG3126>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> Take no thought <WG3309> <WG3361> for your<WG5216> life,<WG5590> what<WG5101> ye shall eat,<WG5315> or<WG2532> what<WG5101> ye shall drink;<WG4095> nor yet<WG3366> for your<WG5216> body,<WG4983> what<WG5101> ye shall put on.<WG1746> Is<WG2076> not<WG3780> the<WG3588> life<WG5590> more<WG4119> than meat,<WG5160> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> body<WG4983> than raiment? <WG1742>

Behold <WG1689> <WG1519> the <WG3588> fowls<WG4071> of the<WG3588> air: <WG3772> for<WG3754> they sow<WG4687> not,<WG3756> neither<WG3761> do they reap,<WG2325> nor<WG3761> gather<WG4863> into<WG1519> barns;<WG596> yet<WG2532> your<WG5216> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> feedeth<WG5142> them.<WG846> Are ye not much better <WG1308> <WG5210> <WG3756> <WG3123> than they? <WG846>
<WG1161> Which <WG5101> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> by taking thought<WG3309> can<WG1410> add<WG4369> one<WG1520> cubit<WG4083> unto<WG1909> his<WG848> stature? <WG2244>

And <WG2532> why<WG5101> take ye thought<WG3309> for<WG4012> raiment?<WG1742> Consider<WG2648> the<WG3588> lilies<WG2918> of the<WG3588> field,<WG68> how<WG4459> they grow;<WG837> they toil<WG2872> not,<WG3756> neither<WG3761> do they spin: <WG3514>

And <WG1161> yet I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> That<WG3754> even<WG3761> Solomon<WG4672> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> his<WG848> glory<WG1391> was not arrayed<WG4016> like<WG5613> one<WG1520> of these. <WG5130>

Wherefore, <WG1161> if<WG1487> God<WG2316> so<WG3779> clothe<WG294> the<WG3588> grass<WG5528> of the<WG3588> field,<WG68> which today<WG4594> is,<WG5607> and<WG2532> tomorrow<WG839> is cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the oven,<WG2823> shall he not<WG3756> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> clothe you,<WG5209> O ye of little faith? <WG3640>

Therefore <WG3767> take no thought, <WG3309> <WG3361> saying, <WG3004> What<WG5101> shall we eat?<WG5315> or,<WG2228> What<WG5101> shall we drink?<WG4095> or,<WG2228> Wherewithal<WG5101> shall we be clothed? <WG4016>

(For <WG1063> after all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> do the<WG3588> Gentiles<WG1484> seek: )<WG1934> for<WG1063> your<WG5216> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> knoweth<WG1492> that<WG3754> ye have need<WG5535> of all<WG537> these things. <WG5130>

But <WG1161> seek<WG2212> ye first<WG4412> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> his<WG846> righteousness;<WG1343> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> shall be added<WG4369> unto you. <WG5213>

Take therefore no thought <WG3361> <WG3767> <WG3309> for <WG1519> the<WG3588> morrow: <WG839> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> morrow<WG839> shall take thought<WG3309> for the things<WG3588> of itself.<WG1438> Sufficient<WG713> unto the<WG3588> day<WG2250> is the<WG3588> evil<WG2549> thereof. <WG846>
